item.title: BAE 系统公司发行债券为波尔宇航公司交易提供资金
item.description: BAE 系统公司正在出售投资级债券，以帮助为其 56 亿美元收购波尔宇航公司（Ball Aerospace）提供资金。【原文：BAE Systems Plc is selling investment-grade bonds to help finance its $5.6-billion purchase of Ball Aerospace.】

item.title: Reddit的IPO命运取决于推动备忘录股票狂潮的用户
item.description: 当 Reddit 公司本周在纽约证券交易所上市时，它的命运将部分掌握在我们熟悉的手中：它的用户。【原文：When Reddit Inc. lists on the New York Stock Exchange this week, its fate will rest, in part, in familiar hands: those of its users.】

item.title: 意大利总统梅洛尼反对直接军事干预乌克兰
item.description: 意大利反对对乌克兰进行任何形式的直接干预，即使它继续全力支持这个被俄罗斯入侵的国家。【原文：Italy is against any kind of direct intervention in Ukraine even if it continues to fully support the country which has been invaded by Russia.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚马赛人被迫为野生动物园和机场让路
item.description: 坦桑尼亚数以千计的马赛牧民即将面临被赶出祖先土地的危险，因为政府计划开发该地区用于旅游业和碳信用计划。【原文：Thousands of Maasai herders from Tanzania are at imminent risk of eviction from their ancestral lands to make way for government plans to develop the area for tourism and carbon credit schemes.】

item.title: 中国人寿空置的金丝雀码头大厦贷款截止日期临近
item.description: 中国人寿保险股份有限公司正在与金丝雀码头一座办公楼的贷款人进行紧锣密鼓的谈判，以帮助避免该地区第三起潜在的重大违约事件，因为伦敦东部金融区正面临着该市空置率最高的一些问题。【原文：China Life Insurance Co. is in crunch talks with lenders to an office tower in Canary Wharf to help stave off the locality’s third potential major default, as the eastern financial district of London grapples with some of the city’s highest vacancy rates.】

item.title: 乌克兰总统库莱巴将访问印度推进基辅和平计划
item.description: 乌克兰外交部长德米特罗-库莱巴（Dmytro Kuleba）将于本月访问印度；据熟悉内情的人士透露，这是俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后基辅首次高层访问印度，为其和平倡议寻求盟友。【原文：Ukraine’s foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba will visit India this month — the first high level visit since the Russian invasion — as Kyiv seeks allies for its peace initiative, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雪佛龙首席执行官称与埃克森公司的圭亚那谈判 "突然 "结束
item.description: 雪佛龙公司首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）说，雪佛龙公司与埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Chevron Corp.’s discussions with Exxon Mobil Corp. and China’s Cnooc Ltd. over a prolific oil field off the shores of Guyana ended “abruptly” a few weeks ago, Chief Executive Officer Mike Wirth said.】

item.title: 摩洛哥在国际货币基金组织警告通胀威胁重现后维持利率不变
item.description: 在物价大幅上涨引发全国范围内要求加薪的罢工之后，摩洛哥听从国际货币基金组织的建议，谨慎行事，将利率维持在一个季度不变。【原文：Morocco left interest rates unchanged for another quarter, following International Monetary Fund advice to tread cautiously after sharp price increases sparked countrywide labor strikes demanding pay rises.】

item.title: 西门子警告中国经济持续放缓将影响订单量
item.description: 西门子股份公司（Siemens AG）宣布其主要数字工业业务在中国的需求疲软，创下七个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Siemens AG fell the most in seven months after flagging that its key digital industries business is seeing only muted demand in China.】

item.title: 影子船队油轮在丹麦附近的碰撞事故中受损
item.description: 一艘由俄罗斯石油运输船组成的 "影子船队 "中的油轮在丹麦附近发生碰撞，使人们重新认识到所有权不明的船只给世界海洋带来的风险。【原文：A tanker from the shadow fleet of ships assembled to carry Russian oil was involved in a collision near Denmark, casting fresh light on the risks vessels with unknown ownership pose to the world’s oceans.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命新体育投资银行部负责人
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）成立了一个专门的体育投资银行团队，因为华尔街的银行们正在并购市场竞争日益激烈的一角争夺费用。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has set up a dedicated sports investment banking team as Wall Street banks battle for fees in an increasingly competitive corner of the mergers and acquisitions market.】

item.title: 临近春季，价值 400 亿美元的欧洲企业准备首次公开募股
item.description: 随着欧洲股市不断创下新纪录，总价值达 400 亿美元的公司正在酝酿上市计划，希望尽快在第二季度登陆市场。【原文：As European stocks notch up new records, companies worth a combined $40 billion are dusting off their listing plans in the hopes of tapping the markets as soon as the second quarter.】

item.title: 阿波罗推出由穆巴达拉发起的新私人信贷基金
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc. 创建了一个新的私人信贷基金，该基金将投资穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has created a new private credit fund that will invest money from an affiliate of Mubadala Investment Co. and other institutional investors for no fee during the first year and waive half of the fees the following year.】

item.title: 参议员称美军面临依赖廉价外国药品的风险
item.description: 根据一个由两党议员组成的小组发布的报告，每四种美国指定的基本药物中就有一种以上被军方认为 "风险极高"，因为它们依赖于来自中国或来源不明的关键成分。【原文：More than one in four US-designated essential medicines are considered “very high risk” by the military because they are dependent on key ingredients from China or unknown sources, according to a report posted by a bipartisan group of lawmakers.】

item.title: 瑞典房东 SBB 因需要流动资金被惠誉下调评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将处于瑞典房地产危机中心的房东 SBB 的高级无担保债务评级从 B 下调至 CCC+，原因是该公司增加了房地产处置，流动性紧张。【原文：SBB, the landlord at the center of Sweden’s property crisis, saw its senior unsecured debt rating downgraded to CCC+ from B by Fitch Ratings due to increased property disposals and tight liquidity.】

item.title: 因关注英国公共利益，《每日电讯报》交易面临新一轮调查
item.description: 英国文化大臣露西-弗雷泽（Lucy Frazer）表示，红鸟国际投资公司（RedBird IMI）对《每日电讯报》的收购很可能因公共利益问题而面临深入调查，这使人们对这项由阿联酋支持的交易产生了更多疑问。【原文：RedBird IMI’s acquisition of the Telegraph newspaper is likely to face an in-depth investigation over public interest concerns, UK Culture Secretary Lucy Frazer said, casting yet more doubt on the UAE-backed deal.】

item.title: 可可供应紧张在欧洲最为严重，因为新规则带来了冲击
item.description: 由于新的可持续发展规定有可能加剧可可豆的短缺，可可价格的飙升在全球最大的巧克力消费地区欧洲受到的影响最大。【原文：Surging cocoa prices are being felt most in Europe, the world’s biggest chocolate consuming region, as new sustainability rules threaten to exacerbate a shortage of beans.】

item.title: CERAWeek 能源会议的最新消息
item.description: 3 月 18 日，与会者抵达得克萨斯州休斯敦参加 2024 CERAWeek by S&P Global 会议。摄影师：F. Carter Smith/Bloomberg【原文：Attendees arrive for the 2024 CERAWeek by S&P Global conference in Houston, Texas on March 18. Photographer: F. Carter Smith/Bloomberg】

item.title: 迪士尼大股东乔治-卢卡斯在代理权争夺战中支持艾格
item.description: 好莱坞传奇电影制片人乔治-卢卡斯（George Lucas）表示，他将支持华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）在与激进投资者的激烈代理权争夺战中表示，他将支持华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：George Lucas, the legendary Hollywood filmmaker, said he would support Walt Disney Co. Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger in a bitter proxy battle with activist investors.】

item.title: 伦敦面临联合利华 170 亿欧元冰淇淋上市争夺战
item.description: 联合利华公司（Unilever Plc）在伦敦和阿姆斯特丹为其价值 170 亿欧元（184 亿美元）的冰淇淋业务的潜在上市拉开了竞争的序幕，这使得英国股票市场可能再次受挫。【原文：Unilever Plc kicked off a competition between London and Amsterdam for a potential listing of its €17 billion ($18.4 billion) ice cream business, raising the prospect of another setback for the UK’s equity market.】

item.title: 石油巨头称 "绿色转型 "乏力
item.description:
埃克森石油公司、阿美石油公司和其他行业重量级企业的高管表示，尽管ESG运动兴起，但老牌能源公司依然生机勃勃。【原文：

Executives from Exxon, Aramco and other industry heavyweights say old-line energy is alive and well despite the ESG movement.

】

item.title: 马科斯称菲律宾降息为时尚早，希望实现 8%的增长
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）表示，菲律宾还没有到应该开始降息的时候，他认为通货膨胀是菲律宾经济以东南亚最快速度扩张的主要担忧。【原文：President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said the Philippines hasn’t reached the point where it should start cutting interest rates, citing inflation as the main worry for an economy expanding at the fastest clip in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 瑞士前首席执行官安格恩表示，瑞士监管机构需要削减银行奖金的权力
item.description: 2013年3月12日星期二，瑞士伯尔尼，瑞士国旗在瑞士国会大厦联邦宫上空飘扬。瑞士央行在将其货币持有量增加近一倍以保护国家免受欧元区危机的影响之后，承诺继续捍卫法郎上限。摄影师：瓦伦丁-弗劳罗【原文：The Swiss national flag flies above the Federal Palace, Switzerland's parliament building in Bern, Switzerland, on Tuesday, March 12, 2013. The Swiss central bank pledged to keep up its defense of the franc cap after almost doubling its currency holdings to shield the country from the fallout caused by the euro zone's crisis. Photographer: Valentin Flauraud】

item.title: 美国银行莫伊尼汉称商业地产将 "缓慢燃烧
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，银行业需要时间来解决商业房地产贷款的问题，此前纽约一家地区性贷款机构因面临问题债务而令投资者感到震惊。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said it’ll take time for the banking industry to work through issues with commercial real estate loans, after a New York regional lender alarmed investors with its exposure to troubled debt.】

item.title: 香水零售商道格拉斯将首次公开募股定价定在最低点
item.description: 随着欧洲上市步伐的加快，德国香水零售商道格拉斯股份公司（Douglas AG）首次公开募股的价格预计将在区间的底部。【原文：German perfume retailer Douglas AG is expected to price its €907 million ($991 million) initial public offering at the bottom of the range, as European listings pick up pace.】

item.title: 中国发布吸引外资行动计划
item.description: 在去年海外投资降至历史最低点之后，中国国务院发布了进一步向外国公司开放中国市场的行动计划。【原文：China’s State Council released an action plan to further open up the Chinese market to foreign firms after overseas investment fell to record lows last year.】

item.title: 房地产之痛正显现在一种不起眼的投资产品上
item.description: 一种用于为高风险房地产项目融资的不起眼的投资产品正面临着前所未有的压力，因为借款人正竭力偿还与商业地产项目相关的贷款。【原文：An obscure investment product used to finance risky real estate projects is facing unprecedented stress as borrowers struggle to repay loans tied to commercial property ventures.】

item.title: 沃伦敦促鲍威尔降低利率以帮助陷入困境的清洁能源公司
item.description: 参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）敦促美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）降低利率，称加息已经 "彻底扼杀了全国各地的主要可再生基础设施项目"。【原文：Senator Elizabeth Warren urged Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to cut interest rates, saying the hikes have “completely tanked major renewable infrastructure projects across the country.”】
